snippet: Josh Hamilton of the Texas Rangers belted four home runs on Tuesday night in Baltimore, just 17 days after Philip Humber of the Chicago White Sox tossed a perfect game in Seattle.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column on Texas Rangers outfielder Josh Hamilton belting four home runs in the Rangers 10-3 victory over the Baltimore Orioles.
lead_paragraph: Josh Hamilton of the Texas Rangers belted four home runs on Tuesday night in Baltimore, just 17 days after Philip Humber of the Chicago White Sox tossed a perfect game in Seattle.

headline.seo: Rangers’ Josh Hamilton Hits Four Homers Against Orioles
headline.main: A Perfect Game and Now a 4-Homer Game
headline.print_headline: A Perfect Game and Now a 4-Homer Game
